/* DayCloseMapper.getDayCloseDtl */ SELECT A.GROUP_AMT, B.HOCKEY_AMT, C.ETC_AMT, D.REMARK6 FROM ( -- 단체 SELECT SUM(tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT) AS GROUP_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_INFO tsshi, TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm WHERE tsshi.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tsshi.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tsshi.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsshi.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO
AND tsshi.STORE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD
AND tsshi.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD
AND tsshi.MEMBR_NO = tmm.MEMBR_NO AND tsshi.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tsshi.SALE_DATE = #{closeDate} AND tsshi.POS_NO = '99' AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = '001' ) A, ( -- 하키훈련 SELECT SUM(tssh.REAL_SALE_AMT) AS HOCKEY_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_INFO tsshi, TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm WHERE tsshi.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tsshi.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tsshi.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsshi.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO
AND tsshi.STORE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD
AND tsshi.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD
AND tsshi.MEMBR_NO = tmm.MEMBR_NO AND tsshi.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tsshi.SALE_DATE = #{closeDate} AND tsshi.POS_NO = '99' AND tmm.MEMBR_CLASS_CD = '001' ) B, ( -- 기타 SELECT (C1.CREDIT_AMT + C2.REAL_SALE_AMT) AS ETC_AMT FROM ( SELECT SUM(tsspcck.CREDIT_AMT) AS CREDIT_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_PAY_CARD_CREDIT_KWU tsspcck WHERE tsspcck.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tsspcck.CREDIT_DATE = #{closeDate} ) C1, ( SELECT SUM(tssd.REAL_SALE_AMT) AS REAL_SALE_AMT FROM TB_SL_SALE_DTL tssd WHERE tssd.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tssd.SALE_DATE = #{closeDate} AND tssd.POS_NO = '99' AND tssd.PROD_CD IN ('0000000000005', '0000000000006') -- 락카,임대료 ) C2 ) C, ( -- 비고6 SELECT LISTAGG(SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) || '(' || NVL(TO_CHAR(tssh.TOT_SALE_AMT,'FM999,999,999,999'), 0) || ')', '/') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM)) AS REMARK6 FROM TB_SL_SALE_HDR_INFO tsshi, TB_SL_SALE_HDR tssh, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm WHERE tsshi.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tssh.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tsshi.STORE_CD = tssh.STORE_CD AND tsshi.SALE_DATE = tssh.SALE_DATE AND tsshi.BILL_NO = tssh.BILL_NO
AND tsshi.STORE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD
AND tsshi.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD
AND tsshi.MEMBR_NO = tmm.MEMBR_NO AND tsshi.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tsshi.SALE_DATE = #{closeDate} AND tsshi.POS_NO = '99' ) D
mapper.insert: /* DayCloseMapper.saveClose */ MERGE INTO TB_PO_CLOSE_KWU tpc USING DUAL ON ( tpc.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tpc.CLOSE_DATE = #{closeDate} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET OPEN_DATE = #{openDate}, CLOSE_FG = #{closeFg}, INTEREST_AMT = #{interestAmt}, IN_AMT = #{inAmt}, OUT_AMT = #{outAmt}, GROUP_AMT = #{groupAmt}, HOCKEY_AMT = #{hockeyAmt}, ETC_AMT = #{etcAmt}, IN_DAY_AMT = #{inDayAmt}, IN_SUM = #{inSum}, IN_MONTH_SUM = #{inMonthSum}, IN_B_MONTH_SUM = #{inBMonthSum}, IN_TOTAL_SUM = #{inTotalSum}, OUT_SUM = #{outSum}, OUT_MONTH_SUM = #{outMonthSum}, OUT_B_MONTH_SUM = #{outBMonthSum}, OUT_TOTAL_SUM = #{outTotalSum}, REMARK1 = #{remark1}, REMARK2 = #{remark2}, REMARK3 = #{remark3}, REMARK4 = #{remark4}, REMARK5 = #{remark5}, REMARK6 = #{remark6}, MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( STORE_CD, OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_FG, CLOSE_DATE, INTEREST_AMT, IN_AMT, OUT_AMT, GROUP_AMT, HOCKEY_AMT, ETC_AMT, IN_DAY_AMT, IN_SUM, IN_MONTH_SUM, IN_B_MONTH_SUM, IN_TOTAL_SUM, OUT_SUM, OUT_MONTH_SUM, OUT_B_MONTH_SUM, OUT_TOTAL_SUM, REMARK1, REMARK2, REMARK3, REMARK4, REMARK5, REMARK6, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{storeCd}, #{closeDate}, #{closeFg}, #{openDate}, #{interestAmt}, #{inAmt}, #{outAmt}, #{groupAmt}, #{hockeyAmt}, #{etcAmt}, #{inDayAmt}, #{inSum}, #{inMonthSum}, #{inBMonthSum}, #{inTotalSum}, #{outSum}, #{outMonthSum}, #{outBMonthSum}, #{outTotalSum}, #{remark1}, #{remark2}, #{remark3}, #{remark4}, #{remark5}, #{remark6}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
